news.title: ‘Numb and in shock’ – Irish mum’s agony after popular entrepreneur Martha Nolan-O’Slatarra’s death on New York yacht
news.summary: The mother of an Irish woman found dead on a yacht in the US has said she is “numb with shock” and struggling to get information about the circumstances.

news.title: JNLRs: Weekend radio the big winner – but it’s not all good news at RTÉ
news.summary: Weekend radio shows from the national broadcaster and commercial stations are enjoying highs at the moment, the latest listenership figures have revealed.

news.title: ‘An obtrusive feature’ – split decision over unauthorised works carried out at tech tycoon’s €3m mansion
news.summary: An Coimisiún Pleanála has issued a split decision after tech tycoon Mark Roden sought retention for unauthorised building works on his €3m Kildare property.

news.title: No evidence of price gouging by supermarkets, competition watchdog finds
news.summary: There is no evidence of price gouging by supermarkets in this country, the State’s competition watchdog has found.

news.title: Restaurant review: ‘Plenty of hits and a few misses at one of Ireland’s culinary institutions’
news.summary: A last-minute escape to Ballymaloe. It’s been a while since I stayed here but things seem much the same. Tea and cake in the drawing room set the tone.

news.title: New safety rules introduced for checkpoints after death of Garda Kevin Flatley
news.summary: A detailed risk assessment of the location of a speed checkpoint must be now carried out if a garda is to conduct one alone.

news.title: £26 to see Oasis and R.E.M, the arrival of Argos, and Wonderbra: 50 reasons the 1990s were cool
news.summary: Oasis take to the Croke Park stage on Saturday. It will mark the 30th anniversary of one of the great cultural memories of the 1990s. Their chart battle with Blur for UK number one.

news.title: Kremlin agrees to Putin/Trump summit on ending Ukraine war
news.summary: A meeting between Russian President Vladimir Putin and President Donald Trump has been agreed, a Kremlin official has confirmed.

news.title: Daniel McDonnell: Irish clubs are out of sight in Europe unless they do something that blows minds
news.summary: There really is a certain predictability about the news cycle of Irish clubs participating in Europe.

news.title: Oliver Callan: Silly hyphens, vile smells and no oversight – why bonkers bottle-return scheme makes my blood boil
news.summary: Nothing makes me want to go mad as hell quite like Ireland’s Deposit Re-turn nightmare. Even the maddeningly stupid hyphen in “Re-turn” makes my blood dre-am of re-venge.
